I 型糖尿病 (Type I, Insulin-dependent)

胰島 β 細胞被破壞 → 胰島素缺乏 (no/low insulin)
通常發生在兒童 / 青少年
治療：必須注射胰島素
Type I Diabetes (Insulin-dependent)

Pancreatic β cells destroyed → insulin deficiency
Usually occurs in children/adolescents
Treatment: Insulin injection required
II 型糖尿病 (Type II, Non-insulin-dependent)

胰島素分泌正常或偏高，但細胞對胰島素反應差 (胰島素抗性)
多見於成人、肥胖者
治療：飲食控制、運動、藥物
Type II Diabetes (Non-insulin-dependent)

Insulin level normal or high, but cells are resistant (insulin resistance)
Common in adults, obesity-related
Treatment: Diet control, exercise, medication
